title: Disconnecting in champion select
body:
I've been disconnecting in champion select way too frequently... just lost my promos due to this :'(
It will often show a player selecting champ stuck at 0 seconds and for my last dc, I actually reconnected to the team chat but enemy player was still stuck at 0 seconds for selecting champion and I could not select mine even after reconnecting to chat
RIOT please help

replies.body:
Hmmmm when that happens it usually means your client lost its connection to the game servers which is why you weren't ever seeing what champs they chose and why you couldn't lock in your choice. 

One good way of making sure your network is able to get a solid connection with our servers is by adjusting your port forwarding and DNS settings by following those steps in this [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) if you're not sure how to do those yourself.
